text: Diane Kruger (born 15 July 1976) is a German actress and model. == Early life == Diane Kruger was born as Diane Heidkrüger in Algermissen, West Germany. == Filmography == Film Year Title Role Award for Outstanding Performance by a Female Actor in a Supporting Role Nominated—Online Film Critics Society Award for Best Supporting Actress 2010 Mr. Nobody Anna 2010 Inhale post-production 2010
